rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0001
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]―That is the directive this time.
Have I made myself clear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0002
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0003
rows.name: You don't look pleased, Ga-Derg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0004
rows.name:
The one famed as the hero of the Lars Kingdom,
now reduced to being worked to the bone by Growth...[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0005
rows.name: It's natural to not be amused, perhaps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0006
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―I cast aside such feelings long ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Frustration is seeping into your voice.
You should learn how to get by in the world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0008
rows.name: Because of that[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0008_2
rows.name:
you end up being employed by the likes of me,
Your Highness Ga-Derg?

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0009
rows.name: Oops, excuse me. FORMER Highness[ST:wide ]― that was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0010
rows.name: As you say, Councilor Luxaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0011
rows.name: Call me Supreme Commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0012
rows.name:
I am the Growth Supreme Commander.
You are merely a disposable pawn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0013
rows.name: I told you this before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0014
rows.name:
So it was.
My apologies for my poor memory, Grandcouncilor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0015
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Oh well. Even if you fail, there are enough Lars people
to throw away however many needed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Strive not to fall behind the Earthlings[ST:wide ]―
for my sake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0018
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Remember, if you are not useful,
your people will fall into further poverty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06130100_MSG0020
rows.name:
You can only work for me.
So that I may draw closer to the Great One[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]
